Javier Orraca-Deatcu

LinkedIn Twitter GitHub

I get to solve puzzles with data… Life is good! I’m a data scientist and super passionate about learning and helping others. I have over 15 years of experience in business analytics, financial modeling, web app development, and deploying reproducible machine learning workflows.

I primarily code in R to develop and deploy software including R packages, APIs, interactive web app, and websites (I built this site with Quarto for free).

My engine of choice for enterprise-grade web apps is Shiny. Shiny allows me to build clean UIs on top of Bootstrap 5 and I can easily inject HTML, Sass, CSS, and JavaScript for endless front-end customization.

Experience

Bloomreach | Senior Manager | Data Ops & Analytics
Centene | Data Scientist III | Strategic Insights
KPMG | Senior Manager | Economics & Valuation
PG&E | Supervisor | Capital Recovery & Analysis
EY | Manager | Valuation, Modeling, & Economics

Education

University of California | MS in Business Analytics
